content: कलापकं {@--1@} A series of four stanzas on the same subject and forming one grammatical sentence (चतुर्भिस्तु कलापकं); for an illustration see <ls>Ki. 3. 41</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 3.">42</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 3.">43</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 3.">44.</ls> {@--2@} A debt to be paid when the peacocks spread their tails. --कः {@--1@} A band or bundle in general. {@--2@} A string of pearls. {@--3@} The rope round an elephant's neck. {@--4@} A zone or girdle (= कलाप); <ls>Śi. 9. 45.</ls> {@--5@} A sectarian mark on the forehead (विशेषक).
